title: New Hampshire Dems Hope Sanders Will Shake Up Presidential Race
teaser: While U.S. Senator Bernie Sanders is a long-shot for the 2016 candidacy, N.H. Democrats appreciate having a second choice.
contentencoded:
The Democratic presidential primary season is officially underway in New Hampshire.

Hillary Clinton is now facing a challenge from U.S. Sen. Bernie Sanders, the self-described socialist from Vermont.

And, although heâ€™s a familiar face in New Hampshire, Sanders is a long-shot in this election. But, he is a long-shot with the potential to shake up the race.

From the Here & Now Contributors Network, Asma Khalid reports.

Reporter

  • Asma Khalid, reporter for WBUR in Boston. She tweets @asmamk.
